description:
This newly decorated studio is the perfect place to be in NYC for the Holidays! With a cool, clean and artsy feel, the studio is within walking distance of all the sites. Carriage rides in Central Park, Rockefeller Center, and the lights and shopping on 5th ave are outside your door! 2 blocks from a major subway station, the entire city is at your fingertips. With a full bathroom, separate kitchen, a dining area and a pull out couch, you'll have everything you need for the perfect city vacation!

Apartment is surrounded by amazing restaurants and fun bars, all right outside your door. Shopping and adventure just 10 minutes walk into the center of Manhattan!

You will have access to the entire apartment, your own manhattan studio!

I will be available via email or phone to answer any questions you may have but will not be there in person.

The lights during the holidays are so pretty and there are so many cozy places to settle in and have a drink or a meal!

City busses to bring you up, down or across town, and a subway station 2 blocks away to bring you anywhere you'd like to go. (4,5,6,N,R,Q) There are also many places you can walk to including Central Park!
name: Charming studio in midtown east
